ModMetaData.name: VOTE and LEADER
ModMetaData.author: YAYO
ModMetaData.description: # A new leader is elected every 60 days. Pawns vote carefully according to social skill, intimacy, family relationship, romantic relationship, same and different ideology, and criminal status. Two days after a leader is elected, the leader will assign whoever he wants to the position. You can no longer manually assign positions to pawns. # The first voting will take place after the 15th.
